flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Take a Pull over design stretch Knee support cut it, sew it, and use it as a cell phone cover.
guide.introduction_rendered: Take a Pull over design stretch Knee support cut it, sew it, and use it as a cell phone cover.

lines.text: I purchased a Knee support at my local Dollar store.
lines.text_raw: I purchased a Knee support at my local Dollar store.

lines.text: Cut it a little larger than my cell phone.
lines.text_raw: Cut it a little larger than my cell phone.

lines.text: Turned it inside out and sewed the cut side closed.
lines.text_raw: Turned it inside out and sewed the cut side closed.

lines.text: Turned it inside out and sewed the cut side closed. The phone slides inside and protects
lines.text_raw: Turned it inside out and sewed the cut side closed. The phone slides inside and protects

guide.summary: Use a pull over Knee support as a cell phone cover.
